topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556e746e636872132e790200#post_556e746e636872132e790200
[bq="trashboat"]Apparently you can get refunds for steam games now.[/bq]
Only within 14 days and if you played for less than 2 hours.  It's cause of a bunch of countries' laws on game returns.  There's a lot of countries that valve is having trouble expanding into cause of differences in laws so they went "fuck it; is this good enough lawyer?", lawyer, "eeyup!", "then do it and call it a night!"
